data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Tonsilla (Araneae: Amaurobiidae) from mountains of Sichuan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Xiang, Li, Shuqiang (2006): A new species of the genus Tonsilla (Araneae: Amaurobiidae) from mountains of Sichuan, China. Zootaxa 1307: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173751
